20110128013032.000|20110128013036.000|CC1|INTERNATIONAL SPACE STATION.    
20110128013036.000|20110128013041.000|CC1|THE HTV 2 SPACECRAFT NICKNAMED  
20110128013041.000|20110128013043.000|CC1|WHITE STORK LIFTED OFF FROM     
20110128013043.000|20110128013044.000|CC1|SOUTHWESTERN JAPAN SATURDAY.    
20110128013044.000|20110128013047.000|CC1|THE ROCKET WAS CARRYING 5.3 TONS
20110128013047.000|20110128013049.000|CC1|OF CARGO INCLUDING EXPERIMENTAL 
20110128013049.000|20110128013050.000|CC1|EQUIPMENT AND DRINKING WATER.

20110128013052.000|20110128013054.000|CC1|FINAL PHASE OF ITS APPROACH TO  
20110128013054.000|20110128013055.000|CC1|THE STATION.                    
20110128013055.000|20110128013059.000|CC1|AT AROUND 11:40 UTC, ASTRONAUTS 
20110128013059.000|20110128013100.000|CC1|ON BOARD THE SPACE STATION      
20110128013100.000|20110128013103.000|CC1|GRABBED THE CRAFT WITH ROBOTIC

20110128013205.000|20110128013207.000|CC1|IT BECAME ACTIVE ON WEDNESDAY   
20110128013207.000|20110128013209.000|CC1|RELEASING CLOUDS OF GAS AND     
20110128013209.000|20110128013212.000|CC1|ERUPTED VIOLENTLY ON THURSDAY
